0.1.name: wordpress/wp-microsummary-comments-track
0.1.description:
Using Firefox 2+ Microsummaries (http://wiki.mozilla.org/Microsummaries), this plugin only displays the amount of * Approved * Pending * Spam comments that you have on your Wordpress blog.

The bookmark will appear as A: xx - P: xx - S: xx where you stored it.

This makes the approval of pending comments much easier.
